name: Delete Patient Record
description: Removal of visit or episode-specific information from the patient record for legitimate data management purposes
businessPurpose: Remove old visit or episode-specific data from databases that cannot hold all historical patient information due to storage constraints
timing: Sent when legitimate data deletion is required for database maintenance or regulatory compliance
realWorldScenarios: Archive old visit data due to database storage limits
Remove test patient records from production system
Comply with data retention policies by purging old episodes
Database maintenance requiring historical visit removal
System migration cleanup of legacy visit records
Regulatory compliance deletion of expired healthcare data

generationRules.PID: Patient identification for record being deleted
generationRules.PV1: Visit information for specific episode being removed
generationRules.requiredDataQuality: Critical - accurate identification required to prevent accidental deletion of wrong records
